MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELDS.title: Incomplete Information
MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELDS.userMessage: Required customer information is missing to process the payment
MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELDS.description: The customer did not provide all required data in the payment request
actions: Ask the customer to complete their information
Verify that the customer has entered name, email and banking details
Restart the payment flow with complete data
MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELDS.whatToDo: Make sure your payment form requests and validates all required data before sending the transaction to Yuno. Implement automatic messages for the customer to complete missing information.

INVALID_AMOUNT.title: Invalid Amount
INVALID_AMOUNT.userMessage: The payment amount is outside the allowed limits
INVALID_AMOUNT.description: The customer tried to pay an amount that is not allowed in your configuration
actions: Check with the customer if the amount is correct
Review your minimum and maximum payment limits
Process the payment with an amount within the allowed range
INVALID_AMOUNT.whatToDo: Set up automatic validations in your checkout so the amount is within allowed limits before sending the transaction. Show a clear message to the customer if the amount is invalid.

INVALID_CURRENCY.title: Unsupported Currency
INVALID_CURRENCY.userMessage: The payment currency is not configured in your account
INVALID_CURRENCY.description: Your Yuno account does not have this currency enabled for transactions
actions: Offer the customer another available currency
Check which currencies you have enabled in your dashboard
Contact Yuno support if you need to enable another currency
INVALID_CURRENCY.whatToDo: Only allow currencies enabled in your Yuno account in the checkout currency selector. If you need to enable a new currency, request activation from Yuno support.

INVALID_BENEFICIARY_DATA.title: Incorrect Recipient Data
INVALID_BENEFICIARY_DATA.userMessage: The customer's banking data is invalid or incomplete
INVALID_BENEFICIARY_DATA.description: The customer provided banking information that does not meet requirements
actions: Contact the customer to verify their banking data
Ask them to confirm: exact name, account number and banking institution
Request the payment again with correct data
INVALID_BENEFICIARY_DATA.whatToDo: Implement automatic format and completeness validations for banking data in your form. If the error persists, review the integration and logs to identify missing or incorrect data.

INVALID_BANK_ACCOUNT.title: Invalid Bank Account
INVALID_BANK_ACCOUNT.userMessage: The customer's bank account number is not valid
INVALID_BANK_ACCOUNT.description: The provided bank account has an incorrect format
actions: Contact the customer to confirm their account number
Verify the IBAN, CLABE or account number as appropriate
Request them to confirm directly with their bank if it is correct
INVALID_BANK_ACCOUNT.whatToDo: Automatically validate the account number format before sending the transaction. If the error persists, review the integration and consult with Yuno support.

INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.title: Insufficient Balance
INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.userMessage: The customer does not have sufficient funds in their account
INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.description: The customer's bank account does not have balance to cover the payment
actions: Notify the customer that they need more funds
Offer a smaller amount if possible
Provide alternative payment options or pay later
INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.whatToDo: Show an automatic message in checkout indicating that the transaction was declined due to insufficient balance. Allow the customer to try another payment method or smaller amount.

PAYOUT_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.title: Transaction Limit Exceeded
PAYOUT_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.userMessage: The customer exceeded the maximum allowed payment limit
PAYOUT_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.description: Your account has configured limits that the customer exceeded
actions: Offer to process the payment in two or more transactions
Review your transaction limits in the dashboard
Contact Yuno if you need to increase your limits
PAYOUT_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.whatToDo: Ensure your system does not allow transactions that exceed configured limits. If you need to increase the limit, request the change from Yuno support.

DAILY_PAYOUT_LIMIT.title: Daily Limit Reached
DAILY_PAYOUT_LIMIT.userMessage: You have already processed the maximum payments allowed today
DAILY_PAYOUT_LIMIT.description: Your account reached the daily transaction limit
actions: Offer the customer to process the payment tomorrow
Check your daily limit in the dashboard
Contact Yuno if you need to increase your daily capacity
DAILY_PAYOUT_LIMIT.whatToDo: Configure your system to automatically reject payments that exceed the daily limit and show a clear message to the customer. If you need to increase the limit, request the change from Yuno support.

PAYOUT_NOT_ENABLED.title: Payment Service Not Activated
PAYOUT_NOT_ENABLED.userMessage: Your account does not have the payment service enabled
PAYOUT_NOT_ENABLED.description: Your Yuno account does not yet have the transfer module activated
actions: Access your Yuno dashboard
Request activation of the payment service
Complete any additional verification required
Wait for confirmation that the service is active
PAYOUT_NOT_ENABLED.whatToDo: Verify in your Yuno dashboard that the payment service is active before sending transactions. If not active, request activation from Yuno support.

AUTHORIZATION_REQUIRED.title: Security Confirmation Required
AUTHORIZATION_REQUIRED.userMessage: Yuno requests additional confirmation to process the payment
AUTHORIZATION_REQUIRED.description: For security reasons, additional verification is required
actions: Look for the confirmation code in your email or SMS
Complete the requested authentication process
Confirm that your customer can receive verification messages
Restart the payment once confirmed
AUTHORIZATION_REQUIRED.whatToDo: Ensure your payment flow allows completing required authentication (OTP, 2FA, etc). If the customer does not complete authentication, show an automatic message and allow retry.

AUTHORIZATION_EXPIRED.title: Confirmation Expired
AUTHORIZATION_EXPIRED.description: The time to confirm the payment has expired
actions: Request a new confirmation code
Restart the payment process from the beginning
Make sure to confirm within the indicated time
AUTHORIZATION_EXPIRED.whatToDo: Allow the customer to request a new confirmation code from checkout and ensure the flow allows completing authentication within the required time.

PROVIDER_DECLINED.title: Bank Rejection
PROVIDER_DECLINED.userMessage: The customer's bank rejected the payment
PROVIDER_DECLINED.description: The banking institution did not approve the transaction
actions: Contact the customer to verify their data is correct
Suggest they try another payment method
Ask them to contact their bank if there are active blocks
Try again in a few minutes
PROVIDER_DECLINED.whatToDo: Show an automatic message in checkout indicating the bank rejected the transaction. Allow the customer to try another payment method or retry later.

ACCOUNT_CLOSED.title: Bank Account Closed
ACCOUNT_CLOSED.userMessage: The customer's bank account has been closed
ACCOUNT_CLOSED.description: The banking institution closed the customer's account
actions: Contact the customer to inform them of the problem
Request they provide an active bank account
Confirm with the customer they have another account available
ACCOUNT_CLOSED.whatToDo: Configure your system to reject payments to closed bank accounts and show an automatic message to the customer requesting a valid account.

ACCOUNT_BLOCKED.title: Blocked Account
ACCOUNT_BLOCKED.userMessage: The customer's bank account is blocked
ACCOUNT_BLOCKED.description: The bank blocked the account and cannot receive transfers
actions: Notify the customer that their account is blocked
Suggest they contact their bank to unblock it
Offer to process when the account is active again
ACCOUNT_BLOCKED.whatToDo: Show an automatic message in checkout indicating the bank account is blocked. Allow the customer to enter another account or try later.

RISK_BLOCKED.title: Security Block
RISK_BLOCKED.userMessage: Yuno detected a potential risk and blocked the transaction
RISK_BLOCKED.description: Yuno's security system blocked the payment
actions: Do not try to process the same payment again
Contact Yuno support directly
Provide the transaction ID to support
Wait for their review before retrying
RISK_BLOCKED.whatToDo: Do not reprocess the payment automatically. Escalate the case to Yuno support with the transaction ID for security review.

AML_REJECTED.title: Regulatory Rejection
AML_REJECTED.userMessage: The payment was rejected due to regulatory validations
AML_REJECTED.description: Yuno rejected the transaction for anti-money laundering compliance
actions: Contact Yuno support immediately
Have customer and transaction information ready
Provide documentation requested by the compliance team
Wait for review and resolution from the compliance team
AML_REJECTED.whatToDo: Escalate the case to Yuno support with transaction information and follow compliance team instructions before retrying the payment.

SANCTIONS_MATCH.title: Legal Validation Required
SANCTIONS_MATCH.userMessage: The payment cannot be processed due to legal restrictions
SANCTIONS_MATCH.description: The transaction or customer does not meet legal requirements
actions: Do not try to force the transaction again
Contact Yuno support immediately
Review that customer data is correct
Wait for Yuno's legal review before continuing
SANCTIONS_MATCH.whatToDo: Do not reprocess the payment automatically. Escalate the case to Yuno support for legal review and follow their instructions before retrying.

PROVIDER_TIMEOUT.title: Response Time Exceeded
PROVIDER_TIMEOUT.userMessage: The bank took longer than expected to respond
PROVIDER_TIMEOUT.description: The customer's bank did not respond within the allowed time
actions: Wait 5-10 minutes before retrying
Verify your internet connection is stable
Try the payment again
Contact support if the problem persists
PROVIDER_TIMEOUT.whatToDo: Implement automatic retries for this type of error and show a message to the customer indicating the bank is taking time to respond. If the problem persists, check bank status or contact Yuno support.

PROVIDER_UNAVAILABLE.title: Bank Service Not Available
PROVIDER_UNAVAILABLE.userMessage: The bank service is not available at this time
PROVIDER_UNAVAILABLE.description: The bank is experiencing technical problems or maintenance
actions: Wait 15-30 minutes before retrying
Check bank status on social media
Try again when the bank normalizes
Offer the customer to process later if urgent
PROVIDER_UNAVAILABLE.whatToDo: Show an automatic message in checkout indicating the bank is not available. Allow the customer to retry later or choose another payment method.

INTERNAL_PROCESSING_ERROR.title: Processing Error
INTERNAL_PROCESSING_ERROR.userMessage: An internal error occurred while processing the payment
INTERNAL_PROCESSING_ERROR.description: Yuno encountered an internal technical problem
actions: Try to process the payment again
If the error persists, contact Yuno support
Have transaction and customer information ready
Provide the error ID to the support team
INTERNAL_PROCESSING_ERROR.whatToDo: Implement automatic retry logic for this error. If the problem persists, escalate the case to Yuno support with the transaction ID and error details.

RETRY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.title: Too Many Failed Attempts
RETRY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.userMessage: The retry limit for this payment has been reached
RETRY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.description: Yuno blocked retries after multiple failures
actions: Review that all customer data is correct
Wait several hours before processing a new payment
Offer the customer an alternative payment method
Document the error to review what failed
RETRY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.whatToDo: Do not reprocess the payment automatically. Configure your system to limit retries and show a message to the customer indicating they must wait before trying again. If the problem continues, escalate to Yuno support.
